meanings.definition: A type of single-celled organism that moves by means of pseudopods.
meanings.sent1: The myxamebae was seen under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study myxamebae to understand their movement.
meanings.sent3: The myxamebae raced each other in the tiny petri dish.
meanings.sent4: In the world of microorganisms, myxamebae are the kings of mobility.
meanings.sent5: Under the lens, the myxamebae's pseudopods looked like tiny legs in motion.
